about_the_game:
A Fantasy Survival RPG Experience

Try to survive in the hostile lands of Setheria, where only the strongest survive. Build your base, find resources and craft equipment to advance in your quest. Choose a class between Tank, DPS and Healer, and specialize it with unlockable talents. Explore solo or online Co-Op (Co-Op highly recommended!).

Uncover the secrets of Setheria

You were sent to obtain a crystal of Moonaris to save your people and Setheria is known to hide large deposits of it. But in order to find them, you have to deal with the problems of this world.

Explore a vibrant colorful world

Setheria is comprised of numerous biomes, each with its own characteristics, such as loot, temperature and inhabitants. Explore them all in order to progress with your character and unlock new content!

Build. Craft. Don't Starve!

In Setheria, survival is key. Build a base and use local resources to your advantage. Don't forget to eat, because starving to death won't help anyone! You also have to follow a diet specific to your hero, because certain heroes can't eat meat while others hate eating plants.

Deep Character Specialization

Distribute attribute points to increase your character's stats such as Power, Health or Mana. Craft pieces of gear that increase more stats as well as provide passive or active abilities. Unleash the potential of your character by distributing talent points to fit your playstyle.

Contact us: moonstarstudios4@gmail.com

name: Setheria: A Quest for Moonaris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core (Intel i3-530 / AMD Athlon II X3 460)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 / Radeon HD 5850, 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Build, craft and survive in this co-op RPG adventure in the hostile islands of Setheria. Choose a hero and play your role in the team. Specialize your character depending on the needs of your team with rich talent and gear system.
